
--- Data ---

```{r eval = FALSE}
aoc.elf::aoc_get(1,2018)
```

```{r}
input <- readLines(here::here("2018/day-01-input.txt")) |> as.numeric()

```

--- Part 1 ---

```{r}
sum(input)
```

--- Part 2 ---

```{r}
p2 <- tibble(x = cumsum(rep(input,144))) |> 
  add_count(x) |> 
  mutate(i = row_number()) |> 
  filter(n > 1) |> 
  group_by(x) |> 
  filter(i != min(i)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  pull(x) |> 
  head(1)

p2
```
